H0.text: What is the appropriate name of the craft which crashed into Mercury in April. Mariner

H1.text: What is the appropriate name of the craft which crashed into Mercury in April. Helios

H2.text: What is the appropriate name of the craft which crashed into Mercury in April. BepiColombo

H3.text: What is the appropriate name of the craft which crashed into Mercury in April. Messenger

A4.text: MESSENGER crashed into Mercury on April 30, 2015

A5.text: BepiColombo was launched on October 19, 2018, and will enter orbit in November 2026
